properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bold shall I stand in that great Day, For who aught to my charge shall lay? Fully through these absolved I am From sin and fear, from guilt and shame.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The holy, meek, unspotted Lamb, Who from the Father’s bosom came, Who died for me, e’en me t’atone, Now for my Lord and God I own.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I believe Thy precious blood, Which at the mercy-seat of God Forever doth for sinners plead, For me–e’en for my soul–was shed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I believe were sinners more Than sands upon the ocean shore, Thou hast for all a ransom paid, For all a full atonement made.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When from the dust of death I rise To claim my mansion in the skies, E’en then, this shall be all my plea: Jesus hath lived and died for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, be endless praise to Thee, Whose boundless mercy hath for me, For me, and all Thy hands have made, An everlasting ransom paid.{/lang-eng}
